name: Seeed reComputer J4012 Jetson Orin NX 16GB

instructions: For balenaOS versions v6.1.16 and newer, please ensure your device is running UEFI firmware version 36.3. Click here for details on how to check or update your firmware version.
For balenaOS versions older than v6.1.16, please refer to the {{name}} legacy flashing guide.
Use the form on the left to configure and download balenaOS for your new device.
bootDeviceExternal: Insert a NVME drive in the Devkit and power up the {{name}}.
bootDevice: Power up the {{name}}. If you have a display or a debug UART cable connected to the device, a progress bar will show up while the UEFI firmware is updated. Please do not interrupt this process by cutting power or rebooting the device.
